how-it-works.title: How Lorent Bloom Works
how-it-works.subtitle: Renting has never been easier. Get started in three simple steps.

0.title: Browse & Select
0.description: Explore our curated collection of premium equipment. Filter by category, price, or availability to find exactly what you need.

1.title: Choose Your Terms
1.description: Select your rental duration - from a single day to months. Flexible scheduling that fits your timeline and budget.

2.title: Receive & Enjoy
2.description: Sign the agreement, receive your package, and enjoy your rental. After the rental period, simply return it to the owner.

0.title: Create a Listing
0.description: Sign up, add photos and a description of your item, set your daily price and availability. Publishing is free.

1.title: Accept a Booking
1.description: Receive rental requests via chat. Agree on dates, discuss details with the renter, and confirm the booking.

2.title: Sign & Earn
2.description: Both parties sign a digital contract. Hand over the item, receive payment securely, and get it back at the end of the rental.

items.question: What can I rent?
items.answer: You can rent a wide variety of items including electronics, tools, equipment, vehicles, real estate, and much more. Our platform connects renters with item owners for safe and convenient transactions.

items.question: How do I create a listing?
items.answer: To create a listing, log into your account, click on 'Create Listing', fill in all required information about your item including description, price, and availability, then click 'Publish' to make it live.

items.question: How do I edit my listing?
items.answer: Navigate to your listings, select the one you want to modify, click 'Edit', make your changes, and save. Your listing will be updated immediately.

items.question: How do I remove a listing?
items.answer: Open the listing you want to remove, click 'Edit', then select 'Remove from Publication'. The listing will no longer be visible to other users.

items.question: Is my payment information secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and secure payment gateways to protect your financial information. We never store your complete payment details on our servers.

items.question: How does the rental process work?
items.answer: Browse available items, select your rental period, submit a booking request, complete payment, arrange pickup or delivery with the owner, and return the item at the end of your rental period.

items.question: What if an item is damaged during rental?
items.answer: Report any damage immediately through our platform. Depending on the rental agreement and any insurance purchased, you may be responsible for repair or replacement costs.

items.question: Can I cancel a rental?
items.answer: Cancellation policies vary by listing. Check the specific listing's cancellation policy before booking. Some rentals offer full refunds if cancelled within a certain timeframe.

items.question: How do I contact support?
items.answer: You can reach our support team through the 'Contact Us' page or by emailing support@lorentbloom.com. We typically respond within 24 hours.

items.question: What fees does the platform charge?
items.answer: We charge a small service fee on each transaction to maintain the platform and provide secure payment processing. The exact fee is displayed before you confirm any booking.

items.question: How do I leave a review?
items.answer: After completing a rental, you'll receive a prompt to leave a review. You can also navigate to your rental history and leave reviews for past transactions.

items.question: How do I list my item for rent?
items.answer: It's simple and free! Create an account, go to 'Create Listing', upload quality photos of your item, write a description, set your daily rental price and availability dates, and publish. Your item will be visible to all users on the platform right away.

items.question: How is my item protected when I rent it out?
items.answer: Both parties sign a digital contract before any rental begins, which clearly outlines responsibilities and conditions. All users are verified, and the platform keeps a full chat history as evidence. You can report any damage through the platform, and our support team will assist with resolution.

items.question: How do I get paid as a listing owner?
items.answer: Payments are handled securely through the platform. When a renter books your item and the rental is confirmed, the payment is processed safely. You receive the funds according to the agreed terms, minus a small platform service fee.

about.title: About Lorent Bloom
about.description: Lorent Bloom is your trusted partner for premium equipment rentals. We believe in making high-quality gear accessible to everyone without the burden of ownership. Whether you're a professional, hobbyist, or just need something for a special occasion, we've got you covered with our extensive inventory and exceptional service.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to premium equipment through flexible rental solutions, enabling individuals and businesses to achieve their goals without the financial commitment of purchasing.

0.title: Quality Guaranteed
0.description: All equipment is professionally maintained and inspected before every rental to ensure peak performance.

1.title: Flexible Terms
1.description: Rent for a day, week, month, or longer. No hidden fees, no surprises. Cancel or extend anytime.

2.title: Premium Selection
2.description: Access to the latest models and top brands across all categories. Updated inventory every season.

3.title: 24/7 Support
3.description: Our dedicated support team is always available to help with setup, troubleshooting, or any questions.

testimonials.title: Real Reviews from Real Customers
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied renters who chose Lorent Bloom for their equipment needs. These are genuine reviews from verified customers.

0.name: Michael Chen
0.content: Lorent Bloom saved me thousands on camera equipment. The quality is always top-notch, and the delivery is incredibly fast. I've been a loyal customer for 2 years now.

1.name: Sarah Johnson
1.content: As an event planner, I need reliable equipment on short notice. Lorent Bloom has never let me down. Their customer service is exceptional, and the flexibility is unmatched.

2.name: Alex Rodriguez
2.content: I rent camping and hiking gear for all my adventures. Why buy expensive equipment you'll use once a year? Lorent Bloom makes it affordable to try new activities.

3.name: Emma Thompson
3.content: The variety of video equipment available is amazing. I can rent high-end gear for specific projects without the massive upfront investment. Game changer for my business!

4.name: David Park
4.content: Started renting ski equipment last winter and haven't looked back. Perfect condition every time, and I don't have to worry about storage or maintenance.

5.name: Lisa Martinez
5.content: We rent office equipment for pop-up events and trade shows. The booking process is seamless, and the quality always impresses our clients. Highly recommend!

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Lorent Bloom was founded with a simple idea: why buy things you only need temporarily, and why let your own belongings sit idle? We created a platform where anyone can rent what they need — or list what they own and earn extra income.
ourStory.paragraph2: From our beginnings in Moldova to becoming a trusted marketplace, we've remained committed to building a community where sharing makes sense. We connect people who have items with those who need them.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to make renting and earning easy and accessible for everyone. We believe that sharing resources is smarter, more economical, and better for the environment. Whether you want to rent something for a project or earn money by listing your items — our platform makes it simple, secure, and fair for both sides.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We ensure every listing meets our standards with accurate descriptions, real photos, and verified information so you know exactly what you're renting.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Building trust between owners and renters is at the heart of what we do. We verify users, protect payments, and provide support for every transaction.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform to make finding and renting items as simple as possible, with smart search, secure messaging, and easy booking.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Our dedicated team is here to help with any questions about listings, rentals, or payments. We're with you every step of the way.

how-to-rent-out.title: How to Rent Out Your Items
how-to-rent-out.subtitle: Turn your unused belongings into extra income
how-to-rent-out.introduction: Have items sitting around that you rarely use? Our platform makes it easy to rent out your personal belongings to people in your community. From power tools to camping gear, cameras to party supplies – if someone needs it temporarily, you can earn from it. Follow these simple steps to start renting out your items today.

steps.title: 5 Simple Steps to Rent Out Your Items

step1.title: 1. Prepare Your Item
step1.description: Make sure your item is clean, functional, and ready to rent. A well-maintained item builds trust and attracts more renters.

items.item1: Clean the item thoroughly and check that everything works properly
items.item2: Gather all accessories, cables, manuals, or parts that go with it
items.item3: Note any wear, scratches, or imperfections to mention in your listing

step2.title: 2. Take Quality Photos
step2.description: Great photos help your listing stand out. Show potential renters exactly what they're getting.

items.item1: Use good lighting and a clean background
items.item2: Capture multiple angles and close-ups of important details
items.item3: Include photos of accessories and show the item in use if possible

step3.title: 3. Create Your Listing
step3.description: Write a clear, honest description that answers questions renters might have.

items.item1: Describe what the item is, its condition, and key features
items.item2: Set your rental price (daily, weekly, or custom periods)
items.item3: Specify pickup location, availability, and any usage requirements

step4.title: 4. Communicate with Renters
step4.description: Good communication builds trust and leads to successful rentals.

items.item1: Respond to inquiries promptly and answer questions thoroughly
items.item2: Discuss rental dates, pickup/return details, and expectations
items.item3: Be clear about deposit requirements and your cancellation policy

step5.title: 5. Complete the Rental
step5.description: Make the handover smooth and professional to ensure a great experience for both parties.

items.item1: Meet in a safe location and verify the renter's identity
items.item2: Walk through how to use the item and document its condition together
items.item3: Collect payment and deposit, then confirm the return date

tips.title: Tips for Successful Renting
tips.tip1: Research similar items on the platform to set competitive prices
tips.tip2: Respond to messages quickly – fast replies lead to more bookings
tips.tip3: Keep your items well-maintained between rentals
tips.tip4: Be flexible with pickup times and locations when possible
tips.tip5: Build your reputation by providing excellent service and earning positive reviews

benefits.title: Why Rent Out on Lorent Bloom?

benefit1.title: Earn Extra Income
benefit1.description: Turn items you rarely use into a steady source of extra money.

benefit2.title: Easy Listing Process
benefit2.description: Create listings in minutes with our simple, guided process.

benefit3.title: Verified Users
benefit3.description: All users are verified, so you can rent with confidence.

benefit4.title: Support When You Need It
benefit4.description: Our team is here to help if any issues arise during a rental.

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning?
cta.description: List your first item today and join thousands of people sharing what they have.

metadata.title: Terms and Conditions - Lorent Bloom
metadata.description: Read the terms and conditions of the Lorent Bloom platform and learn about your rights and responsibilities.

introduction.heading: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to the Lorent Bloom platform (hereinafter referred to as "Platform", "Service", "Lorent Bloom"). These Terms and Conditions govern access to and use of the Lorent Bloom website and related services.
introduction.description: Lorent Bloom is an online platform that provides users with the technical capability to post rental listings and interact with each other. Lorent Bloom is not a party to transactions concluded between users.
introduction.agreement: By using the Platform, you confirm your agreement to these Terms.

acceptanceOfTerms.heading: 2. Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.content: By creating an account, posting listings, or using any features of the Platform, you confirm that you have:

list.item2: agree to comply with them in full;
list.item3: accept Lorent Bloom's Privacy Policy as an integral part of these Terms.

acceptanceOfTerms.warning: If you do not agree to the terms, you must stop using the Platform.

lorentbloomStatus.heading: 3. Lorent Bloom's Status and Disclaimer
lorentbloomStatus.point1: 3.1. Lorent Bloom is not a lessor, lessee, agent, broker, carrier, or insurer.
lorentbloomStatus.point2: 3.2. All arrangements regarding rental, transfer, return, condition of items, payment, deposit, delivery, and any other terms occur exclusively between users.

list.item1: does not verify the quality, safety, legality, or condition of items;
list.item2: does not guarantee the integrity of users;
list.item3: is not responsible for the fulfillment or non-fulfillment of obligations by users.

userAccount.heading: 4. User Account
userAccount.point1: 4.1. To use the Service, you must create an account and provide accurate, current, and complete information.
userAccount.point2: 4.2. The user is fully responsible for:

list.item1: the security of login credentials and password;
list.item2: all actions performed under their account.

userAccount.point3: 4.3. You must immediately notify Lorent Bloom of any unauthorized access or suspicion thereof.
userAccount.point4: 4.4. Lorent Bloom reserves the right to refuse registration or delete an account without explanation for violation of these Terms.

list.item1: comply with applicable laws of the Republic of Moldova;
list.item2: use the Platform in good faith;
list.item4: independently verify counterparties before entering into transactions;
list.item5: resolve all disputes directly with other users.

rentalRisks.heading: 6. Rental Items and Risks
rentalRisks.point1: 6.1. All risks associated with rental, including but not limited to:
rentalRisks.riskConclusion: are borne exclusively by the users participating in the transaction.
rentalRisks.point2: 6.2. Lorent Bloom is not responsible for:
rentalRisks.point3: 6.3. Users independently resolve matters of insurance, deposit, and identity verification.

payments.heading: 7. Payments
payments.point1: 7.1. Lorent Bloom may provide the technical capability to process payments but does not control or guarantee their correctness.
payments.point2: 7.2. All financial claims must be resolved between users themselves.

list.item6: using the Platform for harassment or threats.

intellectualProperty.heading: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All Platform content (code, design, texts, logos) is the property of Lorent Bloom or its licensors and is protected by law.
intellectualProperty.warning: Use of content without written consent from Lorent Bloom is prohibited.

userContent.heading: 9.1. User Content
userContent.content: Users bear full responsibility for any content they post on the Platform, including listings, item descriptions, images, reviews, and other materials.
userContent.disclaimer: Lorent Bloom does not pre-screen user content and is not responsible for its accuracy, legality, relevance, or truthfulness.
userContent.confirmation: By posting content, the user confirms that they have all necessary rights and permissions to use and post it.

limitation.heading: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Lorent Bloom is not liable for:

list.item3: any damage arising from rental transactions.

limitation.warning: Use of the Platform is at your own risk.

disclaimer.heading: 10.1. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The Platform and all related services are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. Lorent Bloom makes no express or implied warranties, including but not limited to warranties of uninterrupted service, accuracy of information, fitness for a particular purpose, or absence of errors.
disclaimer.noGuarantee: Lorent Bloom does not guarantee that the Platform will function without failures, delays, or technical malfunctions.

termination.heading: 11. Access Termination
termination.content: Lorent Bloom reserves the right at any time to:

indemnity.heading: 11.1. Indemnification
indemnity.content: The user agrees to indemnify and hold Lorent Bloom harmless from any claims, demands, losses, fines, and expenses (including legal fees) arising from:

list.item3: user's actions or inactions while using the Platform.

disputeResolution.heading: 12. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.point1: 12.1. All disputes between users shall be resolved directly between them.
disputeResolution.point2: 12.2. Disputes between a user and Lorent Bloom are subject to pre-trial settlement within 30 business days.
disputeResolution.point3: 12.3. If a dispute cannot be resolved, it shall be considered by the courts of the Republic of Moldova.

forceMajeure.heading: 12.4. Force Majeure
forceMajeure.content: Lorent Bloom is not liable for full or partial non-fulfillment of obligations under these Terms if such non-fulfillment is caused by force majeure circumstances, including but not limited to: natural disasters, fires, military actions, government decisions, failures in communication networks, power supply, or third-party services.

privacyPolicy.heading: 13. Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Processing of users' personal data is carried out in accordance with Law No. 133 of 07.08.2011 of the Republic of Moldova "On Personal Data Protection".

purposes.content: Lorent Bloom processes personal data exclusively for the purposes of:

list.item1: providing access to the Platform and its functionality;
list.item3: ensuring technical operation of the service;

privacyPolicy.thirdParty: Lorent Bloom does not transfer personal data to third parties, except in cases directly provided by law or necessary for service provision (payment providers, hosting providers, and other technical partners).

dataTypes.content: Personal data may include, among others:

privacyPolicy.consent: The user confirms that they provide their personal data voluntarily and consent to its processing for the stated purposes.
privacyPolicy.moreInfo: Detailed terms of processing, storage, and protection of personal data are set out in a separate document — the Privacy Policy posted on the Platform.

changes.heading: 14. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new terms on this page. Your continued use of the service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.heading: 15. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at support@lorentbloom.com

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our rental platform

checkout-success.title: Order Confirmed!
checkout-success.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your order. Your payment has been processed successfully.
checkout-success.confirmationEmailMessage: A confirmation email has been sent to your email address with the order details.

cookie-policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookie-policy.intro: This Cookie Policy (hereinafter referred to as the "Policy") explains how the Lorent Bloom platform (hereinafter referred to as "Lorent Bloom", "we", "our service") uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit and use our website. By using the Platform, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this Policy.

metadata.title: Cookie Policy - Lorent Bloom
metadata.description: Learn how the Lorent Bloom platform uses cookies and how you can manage them.

whatAreCookies.heading: 1. What are cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when you visit websites. They allow the website to recognize your device, ensure proper service operation, and improve user experience.

cookieTypes.heading: 2. Types of cookies we use
cookieTypes.intro: Lorent Bloom uses the following categories of cookies:

required.heading: 2.1. Required (technical) cookies
required.content: These cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of the Platform and cannot be disabled in system settings. They are used, in particular, for:

list.item4: proper functioning of core site features.

required.note: Without these cookies, the Platform cannot function properly.

functional.heading: 2.2. Functional cookies
functional.content: Functional cookies allow the Platform to remember your choices (such as language, region, interface settings) and provide a more personalized experience.

analytics.heading: 2.3. Analytics cookies
analytics.content: Analytics cookies are used to collect anonymized information about how users interact with the Platform. This helps us:
analytics.note: The collected data does not allow direct user identification.

thirdPartyCookies.heading: 3. Third-party cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: Lorent Bloom may use third-party services (such as analytics or payment providers) that may place cookies on your device as part of their operation.
thirdPartyCookies.disclaimer: We do not control third-party cookies and recommend reviewing their privacy and cookie policies.

managingCookies.heading: 4. Managing cookies
managingCookies.content: You can change your cookie settings in your browser at any time, including:

list.item3: receiving notifications when cookies are saved.

managingCookies.note: Please note that disabling or restricting cookies may result in some Platform features not working properly.

consent.heading: 5. Consent to use cookies
consent.content: When you first visit the Platform, you may be shown a notice about the use of cookies. By continuing to use the site or clicking the consent button, you confirm your consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this Policy.

changes.heading: 6. Changes to Cookie Policy
changes.content: Lorent Bloom reserves the right to make changes to this Policy at any time. The updated version takes effect from the moment it is published on the Platform.

contact.heading: 7. Contact information
contact.content: If you have any questions about the use of cookies, please contact us at: support@lorentbloom.com
